entities.description: "Waseem et al. is a group that attempted to unify different trends of research in the field of abusive language over the web and proposed a typology for understanding it."
"Kumar et al. made a more detailed distinction in relation to the target of abuse, differentiating between overt and covert aggression."
"TRAC is the event where the Aggression Identification Shared Task took place, involving participants from various organizations."
"CodaLab is the platform used for the evaluation of systems submitted by participants in the shared task."
"Google Form is the platform used for registration of participants interested in competing in the shared task."
"Facebook is the source of the dataset provided to participants, consisting of comments annotated with levels of aggression."
"The Aggression Identification Shared Task is an event where participants classify texts into categories of aggression for social media."
"Table 1 provides the timeline for the Aggression Identification Shared Task at TRAC."
"Overtly Aggressive (OAG) is one of the three levels of aggression used in the dataset for annotation purposes."
"English is one of the languages for which the dataset was provided to participants in the shared task."
"Hindi is one of the languages for which the dataset was provided to participants in the shared task."
"The dataset provided to participants consists of 12,000 randomly sampled Facebook comments for training and 3,000 comments for development, annotated with levels of aggression."
"Nonaggression is one of the three categories into which texts were classified in the shared task."
"Covert Aggression is one of the categories into which texts were classified in the shared task."
"Overt Aggression is one of the categories into which texts were classified in the shared task."

relationships.description: "Waseem et al.'s work is built upon by Kumar et al., who make a more detailed distinction in their classification of aggression."

"TRAC provides a dataset of Facebook comments for training and development in the shared task."
"The Aggression Identification Shared Task involves classifying texts with levels of aggression, including Overtly Aggressive (OAG)."
"The Aggression Identification Shared Task involves classifying texts into categories, including Nonaggression."
"The Aggression Identification Shared Task involves classifying texts into categories, including Covert Aggression."
"The Aggression Identification Shared Task involves classifying texts into categories, including Overt Aggression."
"The Aggression Identification Shared Task provided datasets in English for participants to work on."
"The Aggression Identification Shared Task provided datasets in Hindi for participants to work on."
"Facebook comments form the basis of the dataset provided to participants in the shared task."

entities.description: "A system generated by a combination of twelve distance measures through a K Nearest Neighbors classification algorithm and a canonical genetic algorithm."

"The only unsupervised system submitted in the task, based on a multilingual lexicon of aggressive words, obtained by automatic translation from an Italian lexicon of offensive words with minimal human supervision."
"A system that uses a bidirectional LSTM for its operations."

"COLING 2018 is the event where the TRAC workshop took place and the First Shared task on Aggression Identification was organized."
"Microsoft Research India provided grants for preparing the dataset and to the annotators for their work on the annotations."
"A team that used both the dataset provided for the task and other datasets."
"A team that used both the dataset provided for the task and other datasets."
"Facebook provided one of the test sets for the final testing of the systems."
"Twitter provided a surprise test set for the final testing of the systems."
"The event where more than 100 teams registered and 30 teams submitted their systems for aggression identification."
"SVM refers to Support Vector Machine, a classifier that performed well if features were carefully selected."
"Random forest is a classifier that performed at par with deep neural networks if features were carefully selected."
"Logistic regression is a classifier that performed at par with deep neural networks if features were carefully selected."
"Deep neural networks were used by 14 systems in the task, either solely or as part of an ensemble."

"Isistanitos system uses soft voting of two models, a recurrent neural network and an SVM, for text classification."
"hakuchumu system uses a Random Forest classifier with preprocessing for text classification."
"DataGeeks system uses Logistic Regression classifier with preprocessing for text classification."
"na14 uses Logistic Regression classifier with preprocessing for text classification."
"dinel achieves the best accuracy on the Facebook test set using a Random Forest classifier."
"vista.ue system is developed using dense neural networks."
"MANITBHOPALINDIA system uses SVM for English and deep neural networks for English text classification."
"IRIT system gets the best performance for the English Facebook test set by using a combination of two models."
"quine system is trained using an LSTM with attention and simple embeddings."
"IIIT-Delhi system uses a Single channel CNN for text classification task."
"PMRS system employs a winner-takes-all autoencoder for Twitter sentiment classification."
"resham system for English has been made using an open vocabulary approach and ensemble model."
"IreneR system is based on a Multinomial Naive Bayes classifier that uses unigrams, bigrams, and trigrams as features."
"Nestor uses an approach that combines Neural Networks and a new word representation model."
"UAEMex-UAPT1 uses the same approach as used by the team Nestor."
"forest and trees system uses a Pooled Recurrent Unit architecture combined with pre-trained word embeddings."
"groutar system is trained using random forests with an external toxicity dataset."
"Shusrut system uses an ensemble of CNN 2D with MAXPOOL classifier and a SVM classifier."
"malaypramanick system uses a random forest classifier trained using surface-level features."
"UAEMex-UAPT-TAC2 system is generated by a combination of twelve distance measures through a K Nearest Neighbors classification algorithm."
"Unito is the only unsupervised system submitted, based on a multilingual lexicon of aggressive words."
"MultiCNN is a multiple convolution structure with a trainable embedding layer that gives the best performance."
"sentiwordnet is a model used for representing words in one of the pre-processed sets of features."
"TfIdf is used in various models for text representation, including traditional TfIdf plus Vader Sentiment analysis."
"Vader Sentiment analysis is used in conjunction with TfIdf for sentiment analysis."
"Random Forest classifier is used in several systems for text classification."
"bag-of-word is an approach used in text classification along with other features."
"Logistic Regression classifier is used in multiple systems for text classification."
"Google news pre-trained word embedding model is used for training the classifier."
"doc2vec model is used in combination with a logistic regression classifier for the English Facebook test set."
"LSTM is used in various systems, including with attention and simple embeddings."
"CNN is used in several systems, including in combination with LSTM for the Twitter test set."
"Single channel CNN is used by IIIT-Delhi system for the text classification task."
"Bayesian Optimization is used for tuning the parameters in the IIIT-Delhi system."
"Emoti-KATE is a winner-takes-all autoencoder used for Twitter sentiment classification."
"CountVectorizer is used for preprocessing in the resham system."
"Naive Bayes model is used in the resham system with CountVectorizer for preprocessing."
"Hindi dataset is used in the resham system and involves transliteration into Roman and augmentation with English translations."
"English translations are used to augment the Hindi dataset in the resham system."
"Multilingual lexicon of aggressive words is used by Unito, the unsupervised system."
"Pooled Recurrent Unit architecture is used in the forest and trees system."
"fasttext word embeddings are used in the forest and trees system for sequence input representation."
"SVD matrices are used to align Hindi and English vectors into a single space in the forest and trees system."
"TRAC - 1 is an event where the Aggression Identification Shared Task took place, involving the evaluation of systems."

"Facebook is the organization from which a dataset of comments was sampled for training and development in the shared task."

"English is a language for which a dataset was provided for the shared task, indicating its geographical relevance."

"Taraka rama is an entity that participated in the shared task, using different systems for different datasets and various machine learning techniques."
"The uOttawa system is an entity that participated in the shared task, using a novel deep-learning architecture based on Multi-task learning."
"The Isistanitos system is an entity that participated in the shared task, using soft voting of two models - a recurrent neural network and an SVM."

"CNN refers to Convolutional Neural Networks, a type of neural network used by some teams for building their systems."

"Glove is a model used for generating vector representations, utilized by some teams in the shared task."

"MultiCNN is a model used by the uOttawa system, which involves multiple convolution structures with a trainable embedding layer."
